attributes.title: Depression of Success is a Divine Ambassador
attributes.description: From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda. In this clip is taken from discourse titled, "Bhagavad Gita -- Chapter 1: Shastras, Stotras and Sutras", Swamiji explains 'Arjuna Vishaada', the state of Arjuna's depression upon seeing his own kith and kin in the battlefield facing him. He further elaborates that with failure, there is still hope. But when desires get fulfilled immediately, depression follows. For many, this can be a starting point for going inwards. For those blessed ones, depression is indeed a divine ambassador. The complete discourse or the complete Bhagavad Gita set may be ordered online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com
